panels.description: Time taken to store an ENR in the on-disk peerstore
panels.title: ENR Store Time

panels.description: The cumulative number of prepared attributes by the derivation pipeline.
panels.title: Prepared Payload Attributes

panels.description: Which data source the pipeline is reading txs from. Either calldata or blobs.
panels.title: L1 Transactions Ingested by Data Source [Stage: L1 Retrieval]

panels.description: The latest block height at which the system config was updated.
panels.title: Latest System Config Update

panels.description: The latest block height at which the system config update errored. This is a critical error and will halt the node. If this gauge is non-zero (is set to a block height, there is a bug).
panels.title: System Config Update Error

panels.description: Number of pipeline signals grouped by type.
panels.title: Pipeline Signals

panels.description: The latest l2 block height the pipeline was stepped on.
panels.title: L2 Block Height

panels.description: The last recorded number of frames read in by the `FrameQueue` stage. This metric does not track that current number of frames in the buffer since it updates too quickly for prometheus to scrape the metrics.
panels.title: Parsed Frames [Stage: Frame Queue]

panels.description: The number of pipeline steps per minute
panels.title: Pipeline Steps / Min

panels.description: The number of channels held in the `ChannelAssembler` stage of the derivation pipeline.
panels.title: Channel Count

panels.description: The number of blocks until the current channel times out.
panels.title: Channel Timeout

panels.description: If the batch reader is set.
panels.title: Reading Batch

panels.description: The time it took to build payload attributes.
panels.title: Payload Attributes Build Time

panels.description: The current size of channels held in the `ChannelAssembler` stage of the derivation pipeline.
panels.title: Channel Size [Stage: Channel Assembler]

panels.description: The batches read by type.
panels.title: Cumulative Batches by Type

panels.description: The decompressed batch size and type.
panels.title: Decompressed Batch Size + Type [Stage: Channel Reader]

panels.description: The number and size of singular batches pulled into the `BatchStream` stage of the derivation pipeline.
panels.title: Derived Batches [Stage: Batch Stream]

panels.description: The l1 blocks in the `BatchValidator` stage of the derivation pipeline.
panels.title: Batch Validation L1 Blocks

panels.description: Duration for checking batch prefixes.
panels.title: Batch Prefix Check Heatmap

panels.description: Batches grouped by batch validity
panels.title: Batch Validity

panels.description:
Hardforks that the node supports, but are not scheduled within the RollupConfig for the current chain.

Some chains do not enable optional hardforks (such as Pectra Blob Schedule,) and some forks are WIPs that have not yet received an activation timestamp.
panels.title: Unscheduled Hardforks

panels.description: Genesis L2 Time
panels.title: Genesis L2 Time

panels.description: L2 Block Time
panels.title: L2 Block Time

panels.description: L1 Chain ID
panels.title: L1 Chain ID

panels.description: The Batch Inbox Address (Can be changed in the `SystemConfig`. The RollupConfig's value is _only_ the value at genesis, and may not be the chain's current batch inbox.)
panels.title: Batch Inbox Address

panels.description: Genesis L1 Block
panels.title: Genesis L1 Block

panels.description: Genesis L2 Block
panels.title: Genesis L2 Block

panels.description: L2 Chain ID
panels.title: L2 Chain ID

panels.description: Deposit Contract Address
panels.title: Deposit Contract Address

panels.description: Granite Channel Timeout
panels.title: Granite Channel Timeout

panels.description: Sequencer Window Size
panels.title: Seq Window Size

panels.description: Max Sequencer Drift
panels.title: Max Seq Drift

panels.description: L1 System Config Address
panels.title: L1 System Config Address

panels.description: Protocol Versions Address
panels.title: Protocol Versions Address

panels.description: The peer scoring level configured via the cli flag.
panels.title: Peer Scoring

panels.description: The amount of times peers are able to be redialed
panels.title: Peer Redial

panels.description: Whether P2P Peer Banning is enabled.
panels.title: Ban Peers

panels.description: Gossip Mesh D
panels.title: Gossip Mesh D

panels.description: Low-tide peer count. The discv5 service will automatically search for peers if its peer count falls below this number.
panels.title: Discv5 Peers Lo

panels.description: The P2P IP Address advertised by the node's ENR.
panels.title: Advertise IP

panels.description: The TCP Port advertised by the node's ENR.
panels.title: Advertise TCP Port

panels.description: The UDP Port advertised in the node's ENR.
panels.title: Advertise UDP Port

panels.description: This is the gossipsub topic stable mesh low watermark.
panels.title: Gossip Mesh D Lo

panels.description: High-tide peer count. The discv5 service will start pruning peer connections slowly after reaching this number.
panels.title: Discv5 Peers Hi

panels.description: Whether P2P Topic Scoring is enabled.
panels.title: Topic Scoring

panels.description: Whether P2P Topic Scoring is enabled.
panels.title: Topic Scoring

panels.description: The interval at which to query the discv5 service for new nodes through a `FINDNODES` request.
panels.title: Discovery Interval

panels.description: This is the gossipsub topic stable mesh high watermark.
panels.title: Gossip Mesh D Hi

panels.description: Gossip Mesh D Lazy
panels.title: Gossip Mesh D Lazy

panels.description: The duration to ban nodes in seconds.
panels.title: Ban Duration
